title: checksum error with libjpeg
body:
If you want to report a build error for some package, or a bug in core please use the following template as a guideline:

-----

Summary

### Expected Result

installation of libjpeg

### Actual Result

==> Installing libjpeg
==> Fetching http://www.ijg.org/files/jpegsrc.v9c.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Error: ChecksumError: md5 checksum failed for /home/km0/spack/var/spack/stage/libjpeg-9c-vucrgxb5rnyn5z2vepvhhhdh55m5vs6f/jpegsrc.v9c.tar.gz
    Expected 7794e558c60605424fb1025d836fbf47 but got 93c62597eeef81a84d988bccbda1e990
ChecksumError: ChecksumError: md5 checksum failed for /home/km0/spack/var/spack/stage/libjpeg-9c-vucrgxb5rnyn5z2vepvhhhdh55m5vs6f/jpegsrc.v9c.tar.gz
    Expected 7794e558c60605424fb1025d836fbf47 but got 93c62597eeef81a84d988bccbda1e990

/home/km0/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1032, in do_fetch:
     29            self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
     30    
     31            if spack.do_checksum and self.version in self.versions:
  >> 32                self.stage.check()
     33    
     34            self.stage.cache_local()


### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install libjpeg
...
```
